title: Large number of t209-2s Contentnea's for sale
author: shammus

posts.post_title: Large number of t209-2s Contentnea's for sale
posts.post_content:
Thought I'd move a few of my extras from this set.  The cards listed below are actually a pretty nice group that consists of very little wear and few creases/wrinkles.  Backs on these are clean and damage free as well.

Scans are available upon request and prices include shipping.  I'd also consider trades for items on my wantlist - d311s, 1918 Zeenuts, t210s, etc...- in case anyone was interested in going that route.

Thanks in advance,
Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]



Ebinger (Wilmington) VG - mild corner wear, no wrinkling -- $135
Beusewein (Charlotte) GD - one corner wrinkle, mild staining -- $110
McKeavitt (Winston Salem) GD - one corner wrinkle, mild staining -- $110

E-mail sent on four cards.

DMcD

Hi Brian,

I'll take the Eldridge, please.

Wow, these were popular.  I've been slowly responding to emails tonight, trying to keep all requests in order.  At this point, the majority of the cards have been asked about and quite a few have sold.  I'll keep working through the emails and will finish them all by the end of tonight.

Thanks guys,
Brian
